verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Also thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar thus saith אֲדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD לְאַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> le-'ad-Mat unto the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel קֵ֑ץ <S%H7093><s%> Ketz; An end בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba is come הַקֵּ֔ץ <S%H7093><s%> hak-Ketz, the end עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and; אַרְבַּעַת 'ar-ba-'at כאַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four קכַּנְפ֥וֹת <S%H3671><s%> kan-Fot corners הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the land

עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now הַקֵּ֣ץ <S%H7093><s%> hak-Ketz Now [is] the end עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich, and I וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-lach-Ti [come] upon thee and I will send אַפִּי֙ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi mine anger בָּ֔ךְ Bach, וּשְׁפַטְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H8199><s%> u-she-fat-Tich upon thee and will judge כִּדְרָכָ֑יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> kid-ra-Cha-yich; thee according to thy ways וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and will recompense עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich, and אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all תּוֹעֲבֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-Ta-yich. upon thee all thine abominations

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> ta-Chos shall not spare עֵינִ֛י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni And mine eye עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich on וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor אֶחְמ֑וֹל <S%H2550><s%> ech-Mol; thee neither will I have pity כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for דְרָכַ֜יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Cha-yich thy ways עָלַ֣יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich and אֶתֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten, but I will recompense וְתוֹעֲבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8441><s%> ve-to-'a-vo-Ta-yich upon thee and thine abominations בְּתוֹכֵ֣ךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chech shall be in the midst תִּֽהְיֶ֔יןָ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-na, become וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem of thee and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; GOD רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah An evil אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat an only רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah evil הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold בָאָֽה׃ <S%H935><s%> va-'Ah. behold is come

קֵ֣ץ <S%H7093><s%> ketz An end בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> Ba, is come בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ba is come הַקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> hak-Ketz the end הֵקִ֣יץ <S%H6974><s%> he-Kitz it watcheth אֵלָ֑יִךְ <S%H413><s%> 'e-La-yich; against הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold בָּאָֽה׃ <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ah. for thee behold it is come

בָּ֧אָה <S%H935><s%> Ba-'ah is come הַצְּפִירָ֛ה <S%H6843><s%> hatz-tze-fi-Rah The morning אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev unto thee O thou that dwellest הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; in the land בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba has come הָעֵ֗ת <S%H6256><s%> ha-'Et, the time קָר֛וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov [is] near הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom the day מְהוּמָ֖ה <S%H4103><s%> me-hu-Mah of trouble וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- rather הֵ֥ד <S%H1906><s%> hed and not the sounding again הָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim. of the mountains

עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now מִקָּר֗וֹב <S%H7138><s%> mik-ka-Rov, Now will I shortly אֶשְׁפּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8210><s%> esh-Poch pour out חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Ti my fury עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich, on וְכִלֵּיתִ֤י <S%H3615><s%> ve-chil-lei-Ti upon thee and accomplish אַפִּי֙ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi mine anger בָּ֔ךְ Bach, וּשְׁפַטְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H8199><s%> u-she-fat-Tich upon thee and I will judge כִּדְרָכָ֑יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> kid-ra-Cha-yich; thee according to thy ways וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and will recompense עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich, and אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all תּוֹעֲבוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-Ta-yich. thee for all thine abominations

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> ta-Chos shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni And mine eye וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor אֶחְמ֑וֹל <S%H2550><s%> ech-Mol; neither will I have pity כִּדְרָכַ֜יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> kid-ra-Cha-yich thee according to thy ways עָלַ֣יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich and אֶתֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten, I will recompense וְתוֹעֲבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8441><s%> ve-to-'a-vo-Ta-yich and thine abominations בְּתוֹכֵ֣ךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chech [that] are in the midst תִּֽהְיֶ֔יןָ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-na, become וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem of thee and ye shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD מַכֶּֽה׃ <S%H5221><s%> mak-Keh. that smiteth

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom Behold the day הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold בָאָ֑ה <S%H935><s%> va-'Ah; behold it is come יָֽצְאָה֙ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'Ah is gone forth הַצְּפִרָ֔ה <S%H6843><s%> hatz-tze-fi-Rah, the morning צָ֚ץ <S%H6692><s%> tzatz hath blossomed הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh, the rod פָּרַ֖ח <S%H6524><s%> pa-Rach hath budded הַזָּדֽוֹן׃ <S%H2087><s%> haz-za-Don. pride

הֶחָמָ֥ס׀ <S%H2555><s%> he-cha-Mas Violence קָ֖ם <S%H6965><s%> kam is risen up לְמַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-teh- into a rod רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> Re-sha'; of wickedness לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- None מֵהֶ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem like וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo of them none מֵהֲמוֹנָ֛ם <S%H1995><s%> me-ha-mo-Nam none of them [shall remain] nor of their multitude וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo none מֶהֱמֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1991><s%> me-he-me-Hem nor of any וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor נֹ֥הַּ <S%H5089><s%> No-ah of theirs neither [shall there be] wailing בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> ba is come הָעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> ha-'Et The time הִגִּ֣יעַ <S%H5060><s%> hig-Gi-a' draweth near הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, the day הַקּוֹנֶה֙ <S%H7069><s%> hak-ko-Neh let not the buyer אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor יִשְׂמָ֔ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach, rejoice וְהַמּוֹכֵ֖ר <S%H4376><s%> ve-ham-mo-Cher nor the seller אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor יִתְאַבָּ֑ל <S%H56><s%> yit-'ab-Bal; mourn כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חָר֖וֹן <S%H2740><s%> cha-Ron for wrath אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- is against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mo-Nah. [is] upon all the multitude

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Indeed הַמּוֹכֵ֗ר <S%H4376><s%> ham-mo-Cher, For the seller אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- regarding הַמִּמְכָּר֙ <S%H4465><s%> ham-mi-Kar to that which is sold לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv, shall not return וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> ve-'od long בַּחַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> ba-chai-Yim although they were yet alive חַיָּתָ֑ם <S%H2416><s%> chai-ya-Tam; of his life כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Indeed חָז֤וֹן <S%H2377><s%> cha-Zon for the vision אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- regarding כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הֲמוֹנָהּ֙ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mo-Nah [is] touching the whole multitude לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv, thereof [which] shall not return וְאִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish neither shall any בַּעֲוֹנ֛וֹ <S%H5771><s%> ba-'a-vo-No himself in the iniquity חַיָּת֖וֹ <S%H2416><s%> chai-ya-To age לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִתְחַזָּֽקוּ׃ <S%H2388><s%> yit-chaz-Za-ku. strengthen

תָּקְע֤וּ <S%H8628><s%> ta-ke-'U They have blown בַתָּק֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H8619><s%> vat-ta-Ko-a' the trumpet וְהָכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> ve-ha-Chin even to make all ready הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol, everything וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein no הֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech but none goeth לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah; to the battle כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חֲרוֹנִ֖י <S%H2740><s%> cha-ro-Ni for my wrath אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- is against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mo-Nah. [is] upon all the multitude

הַחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ha-Che-rev The sword בַּח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> ba-Chutz, [is] without וְהַדֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> ve-had-De-ver and the pestilence וְהָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ve-ha-ra-'Av and the famine מִבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> mib-Ba-yit; within אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בַּשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh he that [is] in the field בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev with the sword יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut, shall die וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher who בָּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir, and he that [is] in the city רָעָ֥ב <S%H7458><s%> ra-'Av famine וָדֶ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> va-De-ver and pestilence יֹאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> yo-cha-Len-nu. shall devour

וּפָֽלְטוּ֙ <S%H6403><s%> u-fal-Tu But they that escape פְּלִ֣יטֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6412><s%> pe-Li-tei-Hem, of them shall escape וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הֶהָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim, and shall be on the mountains כְּיוֹנֵ֧י <S%H3123><s%> ke-yo-Nei like doves הַגֵּאָי֛וֹת <S%H1516><s%> hag-ge-'a-Yot of the valleys כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam all הֹמ֑וֹת <S%H1993><s%> ho-Mot; all of them mourning אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one בַּעֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H5771><s%> ba-'a-vo-No. for his iniquity

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הַיָּדַ֖יִם <S%H3027><s%> hai-ya-Da-yim All hands תִּרְפֶּ֑ינָה <S%H7503><s%> tir-Pei-nah; shall be feeble וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all בִּרְכַּ֖יִם <S%H1290><s%> bir-Ka-yim and all knees תֵּלַ֥כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> te-Lach-nah will become מָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. [as] water
